A team of 21 Industrial AI experts.

Ready to support you in your endeavour.

21 Scientists

6 Women

12 with PhDs

10 Different Nationalities

A team of 22 industrial AI experts, ready to support you in your AI endeavour. The EluciDATA Lab bundles Sirris' expertise in advanced data processing and AI. The Lab's mission is to stimulate data innovation and the uptake of AI within the Belgian technological industry.

Become a member

Over the years, we have initiated and executed shared R&D initiatives and bilateral innovation projects, organised trainings and dissemination events, and supervised student master theses and internships on industrial topics. Through these activities, we have acquired extensive knowledge and experience in various industrial domains such as renewable energy, manufacturing, transport & mobility.
